languages.text: "Как пожелаете. Я бы счел подобное справедливым".
"As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."
languages.original_text: "Как пожелаете. Я бы счел подобное справедливым".

traits.locale_text: "As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."
"As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."
"As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."
"As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."
"As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."

languages.text: « Comme vous voulez, mais j'estime que ce serait une juste punition. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous voulez, mais j'estime que ce serait une juste punition. »

languages.text: 「お望みのままに。ですが、それは当然の報いだと私は考えています」
languages.original_text: "As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."

traits.locale_text: 「お望みのままに。ですが、それは当然の報いだと私は考えています」

languages.text: «Como desee, pero yo lo consideraría justo».
languages.original_text: "As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee, pero yo lo consideraría justo».

languages.text: “如你所愿，但我认为你折磨我才公平。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."

traits.locale_text: “如你所愿，但我认为你折磨我才公平。”

languages.text: "Siz nasıl isterseniz. Yine de kanımca hak yerini bulurdu."
languages.original_text: "As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."

traits.locale_text: "Siz nasıl isterseniz. Yine de kanımca hak yerini bulurdu."

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Aber ich fände es nur gerecht."
languages.original_text: "As you wish. But I would consider it only fair."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Aber ich fände es nur gerecht."
